title: Enhanced Accessibility Features
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to have accessibility features like voice-to-text and text-to-speech, so that I can easily interact with the system despite my reduced mobility and temporary use of crutches.

title: Data Privacy and Security Compliance
summary: As an older adult, I want to ensure that my personal and health information is kept safe and private so that I can use ALFRED confidently without worrying about data breaches.

title: Simple Installation and Setup Process
summary: As an older adult, I want a straightforward installation and configuration process for ALFRED so that I can easily set it up without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: User Interface Adaptability
summary: As an older adult, I want the interface and functionalities of ALFRED to adapt to my needs, so that I can easily navigate and interact with the system without feeling overwhelmed or frustrated due to my physical and cognitive limitations.

title: Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to integrate with my health monitoring devices so that I can easily track my health metrics and receive timely reminders and alerts related to my well-being.

title: Support for Multiple Device Platforms
summary: As an older adult, I want to access ALFRED on different devices like my tablet and smartphone so that I can manage my tasks and stay connected with family and friends regardless of which device I have at hand.

title: User Consent Management for Data Sharing
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily manage my data sharing preferences with ALFRED so that I feel secure and in control of my personal and health information.

title: Integration with Health Monitoring Devices
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to connect with my health monitoring devices so that I can easily track my health status and receive timely alerts and reminders for my medication and physical activities.

title: Feedback Mechanism for User Experience Improvement
summary: As an older adult, I want to provide feedback on my interactions with ALFRED so that the system can improve and better support my needs for social connection, health management, and daily task execution.

title: User Support and Help Resources
summary: As an older adult, I want easy access to user support and help resources so that I can confidently use ALFRED without feeling overwhelmed by technology.
